description: Greasy unhealthy food, how could you not like this place?  Satisfies late night hunger.  Up for some danger?  Go to this Jack in the box at 2am.  You will definitely get hassled by the bums.  Stay away ladies.
author: Christopher D.

description:
the "24 hour drive-through" McDonald's on Filmore had let me down ..

so I remembered this place .. even though they didn't have everything on the menu, I didn't care .. just feed me.

my burger and fries were surprisingly as fresh and as tasty as they could possibly be at 1 in the morning.
author: Anvy A.

description: shitty and dirty but its open 24 hrs and next to the pub. very colorful people watching and sanitary bathrooms. at any time of the day or night you can walk by and see the American obesity epidemic taking fold, or admire the new trends in freestyle homeless domestic architecture. everyone eats and goes to the bathroom in my book. a fine place. hamburger deluxe on sour dough please!!!!!!!!!!!!!
author: aidan m.

description: This place scares me anytime after midnight.
author: Lee M.

description: Jack in the Box = Baller status fast food. They got the goods for the big spender, yet they got the 1 dollar Jumbo Jack. What's your pleasure? I'm supposed to quit fast food, but I find myself getting really hammered across the street and end up here to sober up. Maybe I'm trippin' but everyone who comes here in the later hours is either drunk or high on some $hit. I could be wrong but I see two types of people. The really quiet stoners and the loud drunks. Regardless, we all have found our happy place. It's cool now because you can actually go in and order. Before, we had to wait outside and order through a bullproof window. Those days were fun though. In some weird sort of way, it's like an afterparty. Granted, the place could be a cleaner. They do seem short staffed yet efficient putting out the orders. I'm so glad they take Visa since I'm likely to have no cash if I end up here.
author: Butch M.

description: Upon walking into this Jack In The Box location, there's a heavy, grease-filled atmosphere that's smells quite horrible compared to other fast food restaurants. Their food quality is deteriorating as time goes by. They used to have good food when I ate here as a kid, but not anymore.
author: A R.

description: This place is decent for a late-night lard-n-grease craving, but half the time I've been there, the service is absurdly slow--even in the middle of the day.
author: J K.

description: yippie kai meh ... mini sirloin burgers
author: Brad C.

description: expect a line if you're coming in after the bars close, great greasy food for the drunk souls out there.
author: Pickle R.

description: Thank god for Jack In The Box !! They are open 24hrs . When hardly anything else is open , this is a lifesaver providing fast cheap food . The mozzarella sticks are good .. they put melted mozzarella in it btw which makes it all the tastier . The jumbo jack is good , filling & cheap . The monster taco is only $1 but I didn't really like it .. the inside doesn't really taste that good & it lacks flavor . Soda is cheap .. $1.25 for a regular size . French fries are decent . There is a parking lot as well which is good so finding parking isn't a pain in the ass . The only things I don't like about this Jack In The Box is that the parking lot is almost ALWAYS very dirty which makes me lose my appetite and that there's almost ALWAYS bums here . Last time we came here with two of my friends , we gave him 50 cents but he didn't pick it up . Then he asked for a cigarette and kept talking about how he's drunk & 40 so thats why he don't have a job BLAHBLAHBLAH . So we gave him a cigarette and he just wouldn't leave us alone and kept talking in front of us . But besides those two things , this a good place to go after going to the bar or club . Sometimes this place is open on the inside late at night so you can dine inside but sometimes it's closed so you have to order to go  .
author: Eileen L.

description: thank you, jack in the box, for always being there for me when i need you at 2:15am.  you don't discriminate-no matter how trashed my make-up is, how loud we are, how incoherent my speech-you always serve me, and serve me well.
author: asia c.
